_explanation.purpose: Walkthrough phase - adds realization walkthroughs to domain concepts showing object flows and interactions
_explanation.scope: ONLY adds/updates realization arrays in domain_concepts. NEVER modifies story structure or domain model
_explanation.realization_structure: Each realization has: scope (identifies epic/sub-epic/story/scenario), scenario (description of what's being traced), walks (array of object flows)
_explanation.scope_format: Identifies what this walkthrough realizes using dot notation with exact names from story-graph.json. Can be at any level: 'Epic Name' OR 'Epic Name.Sub-Epic Name' OR 'Epic Name.Sub-Epic Name.Story Name' OR 'Epic Name.Sub-Epic Name.Story Name.Scenario Name'
_explanation.walk_structure: Each walk has: covers (which steps/ACs this walk traces, e.g., 'Steps 1-3' or 'Complete flow'), object_flow (step-by-step interaction with actual values)
_explanation.object_flow_format: Use Object.method(param: value) format with -> for nested calls and return values
_explanation.alignment: Must use exact concept names, responsibilities, and collaborators from domain model

realization.scope: Execute In Headless Mode.Direct Message Pass-Through.Sends Direct Message.Complete headless execution flow
realization.scenario: User sends direct message via CLI with --headless flag, system executes in background and reports outcome
model_updates: Description of any domain model updates discovered during walkthrough

realization.scope: Execute In Headless Mode.Execute Operations.Executes Single Operation.Operation completes successfully
realization.scenario: User executes single operation (e.g., 'instructions') in headless mode
